power.title: Concussive Response
power.fluff: With a thought, you transform your injuries into energy that bolsters your attacks

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, your unaugmented psionic attacks deal 1d6 force damage in addition to their normal damage.

power.title: Dimension Slide
power.fluff: You bend the space around you to better position yourself and an ally on the battlefield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide one target 1 square, and teleport the other target 3 squares.

power.title: Evade Explosion
power.fluff: A prescient vision of destruction allows you to sidestep the worst effects of an attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A close or area attack hits you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the triggering attack was a critical hit, it is only a hit instead.
After the triggering attack has been resolved, you shift 1 square.

power.title: Feather Step
power.fluff: With a focused thought, you lift your body slightly off the ground on a current of psionic energy, allowing you to move over water or broken ground with ease

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your current turn, you ignore difficult terrain that is due to the surface you are walking on, and can both move across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground.
You move 3 squares.

power.title: Oaken Resilience
power.fluff: As your mind envisions the strength of the oak, your body acquires that tree's ancient resilience

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain resist 3 all until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Resist 5 all.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Resist 7 all.

power.title: Psionic Vigor
power.fluff: You focus your mind to shrug off injuries

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 15 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Telepathic Challenge
power.fluff: You loom large in your foes' minds, forcing the enemies to turn their attention toward you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You mark each target until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Wild Savagery
power.fluff: You summon the beast wihin, gaining the power to send unwary foes sprawling

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Wild Savagery stance.
While you remain in the stance, any creature you hit with a reactive strike is also knocked prone.
Once during the encounter, while you remain in the stance, you can use the Retaliatory Savagery attack.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy marked by you deals damage to an ally with an attack that doesn't include you as a target

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You either make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy or charge it. On a hit, the triggering enemy is also knocked prone.
